        public int arrivalTime(Stop stop)
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • pathTo

        public java.util.List<Stop> pathTo(Stop stop)
                            throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Parameters:
        stop - An arrival stop
        Returns:
        The fastest path to that stop in the form of an arraylist
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the Map of arrival times doesn't contain a key for that stop
